features.Name: Console size
features.Negative characteristics: Very big and not easy to hide or mount on a wall

features.Name: Controller
features.Positive characteristics: Impressive feedback, cute Astro game bundled with it

features.Name: PSN premium service
features.Negative characteristics: Not as good as Microsoft's Xbox pass ultimate

features.Name: Product quality
features.Negative characteristics: Died after 3 months, loose charging port

features.Name: Backwards compatibility
features.Negative characteristics: Only focused on last gen games, extremely disappointing

features.Name: Gaming performance
features.Positive characteristics: Plays games at way higher resolution, really silent

features.Name: Value for money
features.Positive characteristics: Great selection of first party games, nicer home screen, PSVR option
features.Negative characteristics: Not as good as Series X/S in terms of value for money

features.Name: Customer service
features.Negative characteristics: No screw included in the package
